name: portal.fdz-bo.diw-berlin.de
description: The portal provides access to the Research Data Center for Business and Organizational Data (FDZ-BO, RDC-BO) at DIW Berlin, which serves as a central archive for quantitative and qualitative business and organizational data, offering datasets for secondary analysis and support for data management.
owner_name: DIW Berlin - Research Data Center for Business and Organizational Data (FDZ-BO, RDC-BO)
